comments.comments_text: Goal! Great link up play between Jamal Musiala (Bayern Munich) and Kingsley Coman gives the former a clear sight of goal on the edge of the box. He doesn't disappoint and beats the keeper in the bottom right corner. 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Goal - 2:2! Amadou Haidara tees up Justin Kluivert (RB Leipzig) inside the box and he curls the ball into the left side of the net and past Manuel Neuer.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Emil Forsberg (RB Leipzig) makes it 2:3. He jumped highest to connect with a perfect cross from Angelino and planted his close-range header into the right side of the goal. Manuel Neuer was helpless.
